item.title: Missing Data News
item.description: On this page you will find news about missing data and applied biostatistical methods, referrals to other interesting blogs or articles. Calibration belt With package givitiR a calibration belt can be plotted to assess the calibration of dichotomous outcome models. This is assumed a better procedure compared to the shortcomings of the Hosmer and Lemeshow test, that may become significant in large datasets, although predicted and observed probabilities agree well.
